chat.welcome: Hello! I'm Ahmed, your local guide. How can I assist you today?
chat.question: Hi Ahmed, can you tell me more about the heritage village tour?
chat.response: Of course! The heritage village tour offers a deep dive into traditional life. You'll see old houses, workshops, and experience local crafts firsthand.

ai.suggestion3Desc: Get tips on timing, tickets, and must-see spots.

travel.title: MyPlan
travel.description: A curated itinerary to make the most of your cultural visit.

day1.title: Arrival & City Orientation
day1.subtitle: Getting settled and exploring the heart of the city.
activities: Check-in at hotel
Welcome dinner at a local restaurant
Evening stroll through the old town

day2.title: Historical Heritage Day
day2.subtitle: Dive deep into the past.
activities: Morning visit to the National Museum
Guided tour of the Ancient Castle
Lunch at a traditional restaurant
Afternoon crafts workshop

day3.title: Nature & Mountain Views
day3.subtitle: A refreshing day among scenic landscapes.
activities: Scenic drive to the mountains
Picnic at the top viewpoint
Short hike through forest trails

day4.title: Local Culture & Community
day4.subtitle: Connect with locals and enjoy authentic experiences.
activities: Meet a local guide through ADRA
Traditional breakfast at a village home
Participate in a honey harvesting session
Evening storytelling by a community elder

day5.title: Artisans & Marketplaces
day5.subtitle: Support and discover Asir’s creative spirit.
activities: Visit the handicrafts market
Leather and textile demonstrations
Shop for handmade souvenirs
Talk to artisans using the ADRA AI translator

day6.title: Rijal Almaa & Sunset Views
day6.subtitle: Explore one of Asir’s most iconic villages.
activities: Drive to Rijal Almaa
Tour historic stone houses and museums
Enjoy coffee on a rooftop terrace
Capture sunset photos and ADRA Shorts

day7.title: Reflection & Smart Summary
day7.subtitle: Wrap up your journey with insights and memories.
activities: Relaxing morning at your stay
Review trip highlights with ADRA AI
Optional visit to local café for journaling
Receive personalized suggestions for future travels

assistant.title: Need Help Optimizing Your Plan?
assistant.description: Our AI assistant can help tailor this plan to your preferences.
